data.title: Headline news for August 2, 2023
data.meta_description: The news blog specialized in Japanese culture, odd news, gadgets and all other funny stuffs. Updated everyday.
data.text:
Along with the progress of the Taiga drama '

What to do Ieyasu ', the renewal of 'What to do Ieyasu Shizuoka Taiga Drama Museum' was carried out.

Shizuoka City Taiga Drama Museum Shizuoka, the city loved by Ieyasu

https://www.shizuoka-ieyasu.jp/

The main themes of the renewal are 'What supports and confronts Ieyasu, who has begun to be conscious of the world' and 'The second Sunpu for Ieyasu'. , Hideyoshi's 4 costumes are on display.

There is also a taiga drama hall in Okazaki City, Aichi Prefecture.

I went to ``Ieyasu Okazaki Taiga Drama Museum'' where you can enjoy the costumes worn by Jun Matsumoto of ``Ieyasu Tokugawa'' and the historical facts of Ieyasu Tokugawa-GIGAZINE

By the way, I posted an article like this on the same day of the same month in the past.

The rotation of the earth is getting faster and the day is getting shorter - GIGAZINE

Claiming that the world's tobacco-related industry has become an attractive investment target with the arrival of the ``new era of nicotine''-GIGAZINE
